          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Kitchen - Phrases 3</string>
            <string language="en">The Kitchen - Phrases 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Küche - Phrasen 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Cuisine - Expressions 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Cozinha - Frases 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Cucina - Frasi 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κουζίνα - φράσεις 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Cocina - Frases 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Read and listen to the requests, then do as you are told.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
            <string language="en">Read and listen to the requests, then do as you told åre. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">living</string>
            <string language="sv">kitchen</string>
            <string language="sv">housing</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>

            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">living</string>
            <string language="en">kitchen</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesen Sie und hören Sie zu den Anträgen, dann 
tun Sie als Sie erklärte åre. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben
für Anfänger - Modul 4 - wie leben Sie?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lisez et écoutez les demandes, puis faites en 
tant que vous a dit åre. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour 
des débutants - module 4 - comment vivez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leia e escute os pedidos, a seguir faça como 
você disse åre. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento 
para novatos - módulo 4 - como você vive?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legga ed ascolti le richieste, quindi faccia come
voi ha detto a åre. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 4 - come vivete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάστε και ακούστε τα αιτήματα, κατόπιν να κάνετε 
δεδομένου ότι είπατε εre. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 4 - πώς 
ζείτε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lea y escuche las peticiones, después haga como 
usted dijo åre. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 4 - cómo usted vive?</string>
          </description>
